name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Quality Engineer with a robust expertise in **AWS** and **EKS**, dedicated to ensuring high availability and reliability of cloud-native systems through effective utilization of **Kubernetes** and **Istio**. Proficient in monitoring and performance optimization using tools like **Prometheus**, **CloudWatch**, and **HoneyComb**. Skilled in implementing **GitOps** strategies for enhancing deployment workflows and ensuring stability in CI/CD processes.

Bringing over 13 years of experience in full-stack development across healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging my skills in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Proven proficiency in building scalable applications with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in developing AI/ML-powered platforms, implementing microservices, and ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Strong background in MLOps, focusing on model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
